entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 in the morning. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
